name: Microbot (itch) (BK_OD)
description:
Microbot is a protoype of a videogame i created for a project in my first age in University.

You will control a microscopic robot that goes inside a human host to fight bacteria, heal wounds and kill parasites. 

Avoid hitting the walls or shooting them or you will injury the host. Save him, don't kill him.

Thanks for playing!.
